title: NBC News Chairman Andy Lack: MLK and the Media
description: Andy Lack joins 1947 for a special discussion about a new documentary "Hope and Fury: MLK, The Movement and The Media" - a film that traces how Dr. Martin Luther King, Jr. and other leaders in the civil rights movement used the media to advance their message.
author: nbcnews.podcasts@gmail.com (NBC News)
